changelog:
## BurgTV v1.0.96

### Bug Fixes
- Fix: Overlay stuck on dashboard after exiting fullscreen player (race condition)
- Fix: Wrong series episodes playing when navigating between series (static companion vars)
- Fix: Crash/error on rapid episode clicks (debounce + clearMediaItems)
- Fix: Playlist loading 0 results for valid playlists (OkHttp migration for HTTP→HTTPS redirects)
- Fix: FastM3uParser migrated to OkHttp (follows redirects, proper streaming)
- Fix: URL parameter decoding for Xtream credentials with special characters
- Fix: HTTPS port detection (443 instead of hardcoded 80)

### Improvements
- All HTTP calls now use OkHttp with redirect support (HTTP→HTTPS)
- Error messages translated in 14 languages
- Silent errors replaced with Log.e diagnostics
